response.overview: Martin, a modest and timid butler who works as a waiter in a fancy restaurant, comes face to face with his past one evening when he spots his first love, a woman named Elise, sitting at one of the tables with her lover Dylan. Martin and Elise recognize each other, and he is overwhelmed by a wave of memories and feelings, but he faces a challenge: the desire to talk to her and the fear of the possible consequences of their meeting. Will Martin dare to talk to her or will he remain in the shadows, keeping his secret passion to himself?
response.title: The Butler's In Love
